title: Fontasm
content:
Via Rob Giampietro's [Lined & Unlined](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131010808/http:/linedandunlined.com/): a new blog about typefaces, "which critiques fonts based on how they make you feel" (so says Giampietro).

[http://fontasm.tumblr.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131010808/http:/fontasm.tumblr.com/ "http://fontasm.tumblr.com/")

(Maybe someone should alert [Jason Arber](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131010808/http:/www.typophile.com/node/55521).)
author: Ricardo Cordoba
